version.val: GL HF!&$json["Join Alfheim info channel for dev info and more: [",{"text":"EN","color":"blue","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"Click to open English channel","color":"blue"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"http://t.me/AlfheimOfficial"}},"|",{"text":"RU","color":"red","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"Click to open Russian Channel","color":"red"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"http://t.me/AlfheimForBotania"}},"]"]
Important bugfixes were made, please update!
Elven Story mode is impossible to complete. Update!
Some bugs here, you'll better update :3
New MMO-related features and some other stuff, quicker update :D
Fixed incompatibilities with some mods, get new version!
Fixed client-server modes desync, update if you are playing on a server.
Fixed crash on launch with Factorization.
Nice stuff from 1.12.2 Botania, just check it out :3
